DOC.brief_summary: This research focus effect 6-month behavioral intervention deliver via World Wide Web aim increase physical activity level decrease dietary fat intake general population adult . The study randomize blind . We also plan study subject ' compliance retention rate enrol completely on-line study .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity Dietary Behaviors Adults 18 80 Years Age
DOC.detailed_description: The research design prospective multi-site , randomize , blind trial . Participants fill initial questionnaire 72 hour ( time 0 ) complete inclusion/exclusion questionnaire consent document . An email sent sixty ( 60 ) hour participant agree online consent HIPAA article . Subjects consent participate trial consider enrol complete time 0 data form complete education module . The subject randomly assign either minimum maximum treatment group . Both group send email reminder 7 day prior `` follow-up '' date . They send email reminder 24 hour prior `` follow-up '' date . Subjects receive email reminder every 48 hour 336 hour ( 14 day ) post visit date . Reminder email also state subject complete `` follow-up '' visit within visit window withdrawn study . Subjects blind frequently require make `` follow-up '' visit site . Group A : Minimum Intervention Group A fill data form zero ( 0 ) , two ( 2 ) , four ( 4 ) , six ( 6 ) month . Group B : Maximum Intervention Group B fill data form zero ( 0 ) , one ( 1 ) , two ( 2 ) , three ( 3 ) , four ( 4 ) , five ( 5 ) , six ( 6 ) month . A short online education module give initial survey ( time 0 ) complete study subject . They receive initial `` feedback '' letter complete education module . It also tell date `` follow-up '' visit , periodically prompt return site complete questionnaire . Both group receive `` feedback '' letter upon completion online `` follow-up '' visit . This letter give `` feedback '' base answer data form . All `` feedback '' give base establish recommended physical activity USDA food pyramid guideline . The BMI calculate ; BMI = weight ( kg ) /height2 ( m2 ) . Subjects group complete `` follow-up '' visit 336 hour ( 14 day ) post visit date send email notifying drop study .
DOC.criteria: Adults 18 year 80 year Participants must willing complete initial questionnaire 72 hour complete inclusion criterion screen review inform consent Participants must willing review educational module Participants must willing fill seven ( 7 ) questionnaire per protocol . Individuals access Internet
